Title: iAm Your Biggest Fan
Plot: Carly invites her biggest fan to watch a live taping of iCarly but the girl is so obsessed that they can't get rid of her. Meanwhile, Spencer discovers that his band puts up with him only to use his apartment to rehearse.
GuestStars: Aria Wallace (Mandy),  John Charles Meyer (Dirk),  Kimberly Barnett (Suezay)
